risk_short <- dplyr::transmute(.data = risk, 
                               RISK_NO = paste0("[", risk$RISK_NO, "](#",
                                                risk$RISK_NO, ")"),
                               CONCERNS = CONCERNS,
                               RISK_STRATEGY = RISK_STRATEGY,
                               COST_RISK = COST_RISK,
                               SCHEDULE_RISK = SCHEDULE_RISK)

col_names <- c("Risk No.", "Description", "Risk Strategy", "Cost Risk", 
               "Schedule Risk")

kable(x = risk_short,
      format = "html",
      col.names = col_names)
